Text:
I think i speak for all of us out there without hacker talents 

Please if your going to upload another torrent like this may i suggest for you to take 10 seconds out of your day to drown yourself in your toilet 
 ( I am only suggesting this cause we all are thinking it )

nobody on this site uploads files encrypted and to gain access to the encryption you need to fuck around with surveys that don't work that's like trying to find a torrent but getting a site that requires you to pay a sum of money to download it full speed or download it at all

so please keep your trash out of TPB's databanks there's already enough people trying to ruin sites like this and everyone would much rather not see garbage lying around
well "nobody on this site uploads files encrypted" is going a bit far some people encrypt files to share with people they only know but what your doing is just being a "Major pain in the ass"
encrypted download files tend to be fake...
